"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_arrow"	"Sacred Arrow"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_arrow"	"Sacred Arrow"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_arrow_Description"	"恐るべき精密さで矢を放ち、最初に当たった敵ユニットをスタンさせ、ダメージを与える。標的に命中するまでに矢が移動した距離に基づいて、スタンの時間は0.01 秒から最大%arrow_max_stun% 秒まで延長され、また最大%arrow_bonus_damage% までのボーナスダメージが適用される。最初に当たった非Ancientクリープは即時に倒す。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_arrow_Description"	"Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.01 to %arrow_max_stun% seconds, with bonus damage up to %arrow_bonus_damage% added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits."

"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_flesh_heap"	"Flesh Heap"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_flesh_heap"	"Flesh Heap"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_flesh_heap_Description"	"魔法ダメージへの耐性を得る。またPudgeが敵ヒーローを倒すか、近くで敵ヒーローが死ぬたびに、Strengthが上昇する。Flesh Heapは遡って効果がある。つまりスキルを取得する前でもチャージを貯めることが出来、スキルを取得すると有効になる。"

"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_requiem"	"Requiem of Souls"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_requiem"	"Requiem of Souls"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_requiem_Description"	"捕らえていた魂を使用して周囲の敵ユニットに大ダメージを与え、さらに移動速度と攻撃力を低下させる。Necromasteryで蓄えた魂2つにつき、1つのダメージ波が作り出される。近くにいる敵ユニットほど受けるダメージは大きい。Requiemは起動してから発動するまでに 1.67 秒かかる。Requiem of SoulsはShadow Fiendが死亡時に、クールダウンに関係なく自動的に実行される。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_requiem_Description"	"Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will have its movement speed and attack damage reduced. Lines of energy are created for every 2 souls captured through Necromastery. Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter."

"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ancient_apparition_ice_blast_Description"	"Launches a tracer toward any location on the battlefield, which must be triggered again to mark the area to be blasted by a damaging explosion of hail. Enemies caught in the explosion, or who touch the icy ball of hail as it travels, are Frostbitten, taking damage and prevented from regenerating or healing. If a Frostbitten unit's health drops below a certain percentage, they will instantly shatter.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter."

The enemy can only be frozen so often, but the freeze cooldown decreases based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>."

"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_tether"	"Tether"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_tether"	"Tether"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_tether_Description"	"自身を味方のヒーローと繋ぎ、両者がボーナス移動速度を得る。自身がHPかマナを回復すると、繋がったヒーローはその1.5倍量を得る。Tetherを横切ったあらゆる敵ユニットはスローを受ける。Tetherは対象の味方ユニットが遠くなりすぎるか、Io自身がTetherをキャンセルすることで解除される。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_tether_Description"	"Tethers Io to an allied unit, granting bonus movement speed to both. When Io restores health or mana, tethered units target gains a larger portion of that amount. The tether breaks when the allied unit moves too far away, or Io cancels the tether."

Deals Pure damage to units petrified by Stone Gaze.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter."

"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_medusa_stone_gaze_Description"	"Any enemy units looking at Medusa will have their movement and attack speed slowed.  If 2 seconds of total time is accumulated looking at Medusa while Stone Gaze is active, that unit will turn to stone.  Petrified units are stunned, have 100%% magic damage resistance, and take bonus physical damage.  If the petrified unit is an illusion, it is immediately killed."

"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_chakram_Description"	"メインののこぎりの刃を指定地点に向けて投げる。のこぎりはその場で回転し周囲にダメージを与える。更に、のこぎりの刃に捕らえられた敵は足りないヘルスの 5%% の減速をうける。刃は投げられた時と戻るときにダメージを与え、進路上の木を切り倒す。アビリティの使用中にマナが消費され、自身は通常攻撃できなくなる。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_chakram_Description"	"Fires your main saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it.  Enemies caught in the saw blade will move more slowly for every 5%% of health missing. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted.  While active the ability costs mana, and you lose the ability to attack.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter."
